title: Receives a leaver buster on first time leave also not my fault league client bug splat
body: OK so I received my first leaving warning and if i leave next game i will be banned also bug splat did it not me so really riot?

replies.body:
Spartan Cupcake,

The warning is just that, a warning. You will receive it the first time you are considered a leaver, or an afk. The only reason you get a warning is to say, "hey .. there's a system in place that will punish you if this becomes a pattern." The system has no way of telling whether you did it on purpose, or you suffered some sort of bug. 

Fear not though! The system does not punish people for an occasional disconnect, it punishes people who exhibit a pattern of leaving and afking. In fact, leaverbuster will never ban anyone. Instead, it will increasing apply a higher level of 'low priority queue' punishment that the player must wait through.

If you are experiencing a high number of bug splats or disconnects, I would encourage you to resolve the issue before attempting to play more games.
